document_data.name: Hoktant chaka
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hoktant chaka''' was a prominent [[chaka]] within the [[Shining Lands]] of [[southeast Faer√ªn]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] and a member of the [[Chakas of 31]].
document_data.Base of Operations: They were based out of the coastal city of [[Zabbasz]] in [[Estagund]].
document_data.Activity: Seven master traders within the chaka ensured their coffers were always full. The Hoktant chaka's wealth came exclusively from trade.
